events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their car which occurred on the highway during rush hour traffic.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and damage details.
A claims agent was assigned to handle the case and to coordinate with the customer and repair shops.
Acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer that the investigation process would start shortly.
Requested the customer to submit photographs of the damaged vehicle and the police report for verification.
Received all requested documents from the customer, including the accident police report and repair estimates.
The investigation into the circumstances of the collision has started by the assigned claims team.
Completing investigation confirmed the accident's cause and that the claim met policy conditions.
Proposed a settlement amount based on repair costs and coverage limits for customer review.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and requested prompt payment processing.
The claim was officially approved after final verification and confirmation of all required documents.
The payment for the approved claim was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account as per the settlement terms.
The claim was officially closed in the system after the payment was confirmed received by the customer.
The case files were archived for record-keeping and potential future reference as per company policy.
